article_title: Ingersoll Rand CIO Values Buying Tech Over Building It
article_text:
Ingersoll Rand Ingersoll Rand CIO Stephen Hagood

Ingersoll Rand CIO Stephen Hagood prefers to buy technology off the shelf rather than build tools from scratch. It’s a counterpoint to companies like Tesla Motors Inc., Facebook Inc. and flash retailer Zulily Inc., who say home-grown software tools provide a key competitive advantage.
